ref: 12301a †śama -- 2 m. ʻ hasta -- (measure of length?) ʼ lex., catuḥśamī -- f. ʻ 4 śama long ʼ Kauś. [Rather than śamī -- 3 which may be extracted from catuḥśamī -- ; cf. also śaya -- ʻ hasta -- (also as measure) ʼ VarBr̥S.?]
WPah.kṭg. śɔ̄˜ (with high level tone) m. ʻ measure of length from elbow to finger -- tips ʼ, (+ muṣṭi -- ) mvṭ -- śɔ̄˜ m. ʻ measure from fist to elbow ʼ,
